content.html: “Jeez, why do you always get so defensive?” idk, it’s almost like spending my formative years being criticized for things i didn’t do on purpose taught me to reflexively stand up for myself (since no one else ever did)
content.value:
“Jeez, why do you always get so defensive?”

idk, it’s almost like spending my formative years being criticized for things i didn’t do on purpose taught me to reflexively stand up for myself (since no one else ever did)
